description: Soon summer will be over - I can feel it. But today was again a very hot day... perfect for hunting in an air-conditioned shopping-mall. When I came there today I already saw two nice guys in the first minute. But they were either together with their girlfriend or simply just too fast for me. After a while I noticed a lonely guy who looked quite bored. He was waiting for a friend as I found out. We started to talk and he told me that he he had a part-time job during his holidays and that he needed money for his car. What a promising information. And indeed it wasn´t too difficult to buy his underwear. He thought it is kinda weird but he still accepted that crazy offer. So I raised the amount and convinced him to run naked though the parking ground towards his car...
title: Czech Hunter 212
